import logo from'./holberton-logo.jpg';import'./App.css';import{getFullYear,getFooterCopy}from'./utils.js';// https://www.codeproject.com/Tips/1248317/Creating-Labels-for-Input-Elements-in-React
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var date=getFullYear();var index=getFooterCopy(true);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"App-logo",alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"School dashboard"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Login to access the full dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"email",type:"email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"password",type:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"OK"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App-footer",children:["Copyright ",date," - ",index]})]});}export default App;
